text: The 2002 Tour de Hongrie was the 29th edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 6 to 11 August 2002. The race started in Nagykanizsa and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Zoltán Vanik. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | Postás-Matáv | style="text- align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Joko-Velamos | style="text-align:right;" | + 15" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Joko-Velamos | style="text-align:right;" | + 17" |} |} ==References== 2002 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
